title: Pet Friendly, Dog Station & So Much More! Lease today!!
posting_body: Visit This Website to See More:
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1224 Sq.
Ready to embrace vacation-inspired living in Bellevue, WA?
The modern one, two, and three bedroom apartments at Overlook at Lakemont come in a variety of spacious, pet-friendly floor plans for rent in King County near Issaquah.
This quiet suburban oasis is just minutes from I-90 and a host of shops, restaurants, and recreation destinations.

Our interiors were designed to elevate and streamline your day-to-day with features that are equal parts form and function, like walk-in closets, a fireplace, and a private patio or balcony, while our onsite amenities like a swimming pool and hot tub will help you kick back and relax.
Live it up, wind it down, or take life at whatever pace you desire – your new home delivers the lifestyle you’ve been searching for.
Experience your best life at Overlook at Lakemont.
At Overlook at Lakemont, we know just how much you love your furry friends.
Our spacious layouts and light-filled rooms are the perfect place for your pets.
As a pet-friendly community in Bellevue, Washington, we encourage you to bring your canine or feline friends with you.
For more information on our pet policy, contact our friendly leasing team today.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
